title: Design and Execution of International Partnership Strategies for SMEs

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of international business concepts and basic organizational management
context.additional_context: A course for general citizens to understand international cooperation strategies for SMEs through case analysis and practice, combining digital device-based online learning with offline workshops

learning_goals: One can explain at least three roles of internal stakeholders (managers, practitioners) in the international partnership formation process
One can apply a partnership strategy model combining planning and opportunity capture to real-world cases
Teams can propose organizational learning enhancement strategies through partnership experiences as a group project
One can comparatively analyze regional (North America-Europe) differences in partnership strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
